name: 👋  Welcome to City Curator
comment:
This demo page shows you **every feature** in 60 seconds.

• All real guides work exactly the same way.
• Feel free to tap around — nothing here requires a licence key.

name: 1️⃣  Pick a city
comment:
Open the drop-down at the top and choose **Osaka** or **Hong Kong**.

> Each city is a hand-curated short-list — no ads, no AI-generated fluff.

name: 2️⃣  Filter & Search
comment:
• Tap the 🍴 Food, 💰 Shopping or 🕶 Sight-seeing icons to filter.
• Type in the Search bar to jump straight to *ramen*, *museum* … anything.

name: 3️⃣  Distance + time
comment:
If you allow location, we calculate a walking route from where you stand:

• < 100 m → shows metres.
• ≥ 100 m → shows km with one decimal.
• Minutes = km × 12 (average stroll).

name: 4️⃣  Buy a guide (⚡ one-time €5)
comment:
Tap **Get this city** → checkout on Gumroad.
You’ll receive an email & receipt **with a licence key**.

name: 5️⃣  Unlock with your key
comment:
Back in City Curator tap **I have a code 🔑**, paste the key and you’re done.

✓ Loads instantly ✓ Works offline ✓ The key never expires.

name: 6️⃣  Use the key on more devices
comment:
Paste the same key on your phone, tablet or laptop — no extra charge.
(Each device stores the key *only in your own browser*.)

name: 7️⃣  Offline / Add to Home Screen
comment:
The first time you open a city, data is saved for offline use.
Add the site to your phone’s home screen for a clean, app-like icon.

name: 8️⃣  Geolocation not working?
comment:
• Make sure Location Services are on for your browser.
• Still blocked? Tap **Enable my location** in the yellow banner.
• You can always browse the list without location.

name: 🚀  Ready?
comment:
Switch to **Osaka** or **Hong Kong** in the drop-down and explore!

Need help? Email us any time at support@citycurator.app
